TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Icon : MarshalByRefObject, ICloneable, IDisposable, System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Icon extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Icon Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements ICloneable, IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class Icon sealed : MarshalByRefObject, ICloneable, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 代表 Windows 圖示，這個圖示為用來代表物件的小型點陣圖影像。

span.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

summary.span: 雖然圖示的大小是由系統決定，但是圖示仍然可以視為透明的點陣圖。

span.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建構從檔案、 資料流或內嵌的資源的物件。You can construct objects from files, streams, or embedded resources. 如需建構函式的清單，請參閱。For a list of constructors, see . 您也可以轉換使用點陣圖方法。You can also convert an to a bitmap by using the method. 圖示資源可以包含多個圖示的影像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一個圖示檔可能包含數個的大小和色彩深度影像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 使用應用程式中的映像，取決於作業系統和設定。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 下列清單詳細說明圖示的一般大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 個像素 x 16 像素為單位16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 像素 x 32 像素為單位32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素為單位48 pixels x 48 pixels ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，並貼上下列程式碼。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 呼叫`IconToBitmap`方法在表單的事件處理常式，傳遞`e`為。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖示資源可以包含多個圖示的影像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一個圖示檔可能包含數個的大小和色彩深度影像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 使用應用程式中的映像，取決於作業系統和設定。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 下列清單詳細說明圖示的一般大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 個像素 x 16 像素為單位16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 像素 x 32 像素為單位32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素為單位48 pixels x 48 pixels 這個建構函式會傳回包含在指定的資料流中的最小影像。This constructor returns the smallest image that is contained in the specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖示資源可以包含多個圖示的影像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一個圖示檔可能包含數個的大小和色彩深度影像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 使用應用程式中的映像，取決於作業系統和設定。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 下列清單詳細說明圖示的一般大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 個像素 x 16 像素為單位16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 像素 x 32 像素為單位32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素為單位48 pixels x 48 pixels 這個建構函式會傳回包含指定的檔案中的最小影像。This constructor returns the smallest image that is contained in the specified file.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and attempts to find a version of the icon that matches the requested size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果版本找不到完全符合大小會使用最接近的相符項目。If a version cannot be found that exactly matches the size, the closest match is used. 如果`original`參數是包含單一的大小，這個方法只會建立重複的圖示。If the `original` parameter is an that has a single size, this method only creates a duplicate icon. 使用自動縮放功能方法，以調整大小圖示。Use the stretching capabilities of the method to resize the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的檔案不包含符合所需的大小的影像，則會傳回具有最接近大小的圖示。If the specified file does not contain an image that matches the desired size, the icon that has the closest size is returned. `fileName`應該包含的完整路徑，如果不是目前的應用程式目錄中。The `fileName` should include the complete path if it is not in the current application directory.

summary.span: 從指定的組件中的資源，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from a resource in the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立從所指定的名稱與資源`resource`包含所指定之類型的組件中的參數`type`參數。This constructor creates an from a resource with the name specified by the `resource` parameter in the assembly that contains the type specified by the `type` parameter. 這個建構函式結合的指定資源類型的字串名稱以及命名空間，並尋找組件資訊清單中的相符項目。This constructor combines the namespace of the given type together with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest. 例如您在傳遞型別和`Error.ico`至這個建構函式，而且會尋找名為資源`System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`。For example you can pass in the type and `Error.ico` to this constructor, and it looks for a resource that is named `System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到 Windows Form 和處理表單的事件。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and handle the form's event. 呼叫`ConstructAnIconFromAType`方法從事件處理常式，傳遞`e`為。Call the `ConstructAnIconFromAType` method from the event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 相對路徑會假設為相對於目前工作目錄。A relative path is assumed to be relative to the current working directory. 當會使用與點陣圖的縮圖影像可能會傳回而不圖示系統正在執行的應用程式是否會導致才會顯示為縮圖影像的點陣圖檔案的登錄設定。When is used with bitmaps, a thumbnail image may be returned instead of an icon if the system that is running the application has a registry setting that causes bitmap files to be shown as thumbnail images. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`ExtractAssociatedIconEx`從表單的建構函式或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `ExtractAssociatedIconEx` from the form's constructor or event handler. The this method creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法時，您必須處置原始圖示使用`DestroyIcon`Win32 API，以確保會釋放資源中的方法。When using this method, you must dispose of the original icon by using the `DestroyIcon` method in the Win32 API to ensure that the resources are released. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 將該物件繪製到螢幕。Draws that object to the screen. - 取得圖示控制代碼。Gets an icon handle for the . - 設定圖示從控制代碼建立表單的屬性。Sets the attribute of the form to an icon created from the handle. - 呼叫 Win32 API 函式`DestroyIcon`釋放資源。Calls the Win32 API function `DestroyIcon` to release resources. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何載入點陣圖，以從處理使用列舉型別，以及如何使用繪製點陣圖的矩形界限的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an handle using the enumeration and how to use the method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含名為按鈕`Button2`。Create a form that contains a button named `Button2`. 程式碼貼入表單，並將這個方法與按鈕產生關聯事件。Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 透明區域的圖示都會遺失，當它轉換成點陣圖，並產生的點陣圖透明的色彩會設為`RGB(13,11,12)`。The transparent areas of the icon are lost when it is converted to a bitmap, and the transparent color of the resulting bitmap is set to `RGB(13,11,12)`. 傳回的點陣圖會具有相同的高度和寬度為原始圖示。The returned bitmap has the same height and width as the original icon. > [!NOTE] > Framework 版本 4.6 支援開頭新增的.ico 檔案中的 PNG 畫面格。Beginning with framework version 4.6 support was added for PNG frames in .ico files. 以舊版 framework 為目標但在執行 4.6 的位元應用程式可以選擇在新的行為將下列這一行加入``app.config 檔的區段：``Applications that target earlier versions of the framework but are running on the 4.6 bits can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following line to the `` section of the app.config file:`` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，並貼上下列程式碼。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 呼叫`IconToBitmap`中表單的方法。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's . 事件處理常式，傳遞`e`為。event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]
